title: Plate, "Accordion Player", 1920
markings: Marks: On underside: hammer, sickle, cog, 1920 hand-painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with wide blue border; in the center a man dressed in Russian peasant costume playing accordion, tree, grass, flowers

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Accordion Player", 1920.
1920. porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-7.
